originalText.text: I can't say enough good things about Amanda. She was warm, insightful and so helpful. I'm not sure if I got hypnotized, but she certainly opened my eyes and helped to point me on a new productive path.

text.text: I can't say enough good things about Amanda. She was warm, insightful and so helpful. I'm not sure if I got hypnotized, but she certainly opened my eyes and helped to point me on a new productive path.

originalText.text: Working with Amanda helped me immensely when I was in a deep pit of despair. I tried everything, and thought there was no hope; but in a few short sessions of hypnotherapy, I was able to climb out and see the light. I highly recommend working with Amanda and trying out hypnotherapy. It will shine the light in and you will see things anew.

text.text: Working with Amanda helped me immensely when I was in a deep pit of despair. I tried everything, and thought there was no hope; but in a few short sessions of hypnotherapy, I was able to climb out and see the light. I highly recommend working with Amanda and trying out hypnotherapy. It will shine the light in and you will see things anew.

originalText.text: Amanda has incredible insight and intuition that has seen me through many obstacles and helped me to achieve a great deal of success in my personal endeavors. Her humor and sensitivity has made sessions with her easeful and incredibly supportive. I simply cannot recommend her enough. A truly talented practitioner.

text.text: Amanda has incredible insight and intuition that has seen me through many obstacles and helped me to achieve a great deal of success in my personal endeavors. Her humor and sensitivity has made sessions with her easeful and incredibly supportive. I simply cannot recommend her enough. A truly talented practitioner.

originalText.text: I am so grateful for hypnotherapy. This type of therapy, guided meditation, is very effective and can help almost anyone dealing with anything. Also a great way to dive deeper into your subconscious mind. As an athlete I am able to find calm during the chaos and stay focused in the game. Thank you Amanda for your work!

text.text: I am so grateful for hypnotherapy. This type of therapy, guided meditation, is very effective and can help almost anyone dealing with anything. Also a great way to dive deeper into your subconscious mind. As an athlete I am able to find calm during the chaos and stay focused in the game. Thank you Amanda for your work!

originalText.text: Amanda's work has been a tremendous help through difficult times and her candor and honesty have allowed me to see a clear path forward for how to get "un-stuck," both through transforming subconscious beliefs with Hypnotherapy, as well as offering practical advice about lifestyle habits. Thank you!
